issue.title: [CF 1174] Track DoT's that would put a stealth cast back on cooldown
issue.body:
Would it be possible to track only the debuffs that cause damage over time, perhaps by checking their tooltips for the strings "damage over X sec" or "damage every X sec" (the addon could also cache the IDs of spells that have these strings, to avoid having to do future tooltip checks on them).

I already have an Icon to show the cooldown on stealth, but if I could use a meta icon combining that with one that shows how long any DoTs on me are going to last, that would save a lot of stealth casts that just get wasted by a DoT tick, putting stealth back onto cooldown.


> Posted by CurseForge user pereidh | Imported from CurseForge issue #1174 | Raw

comments.body:
This is a bit too specific to warrant a whole new icon type. You could just keep adding to a list of spells in a buff/debuff icon for this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
